title: Survey of U.S. History I
description: A survey of U.S. History to the post-Civil War period. Colonial settlement, the American Revolution and the Constitution, antebellum expansion, slavery and plantation economy, sectional conflict and Civil War, Reconstruction. Includes study of Georgia history during this period.
